title: Fiend
description: Wait for your invitation...CALLIEA lesson I’ve learned since enrolling at Briarcliff Academy: If you don’t join forces with their elite society, you will be ruined.I didn’t join. I rebelled.They couldn’t break me how they wanted.And now, they’re after me for what I know.Worse, they're ordering Chase, the boy who helped me uncover their terrible sins, to exact their revenge.He won’t, because he cares about me.We’ve been together in this from the beginning, despite the edicts he was raised on and the society he was groomed to follow.But will our love be strong enough to break the bonds of his sordid history?THE NOBLES & VIRTUESHa. Your move, Callie.FIEND is the stunning, angst-ridden continuation of the Briarcliff Secret Society Series and contains enemies-to-lovers, bullying, and other mature themes and scenes. Recommended for readers 17 and over. It is NOT a standalone and ends on a cliffhanger.
author: Ketley Allison
